André Trocmé (Amụrụ n'ọnwa April 7, 1901 ruo n'ọnwa June 5, 1971) na nwunye ya, Magda (née Grilli di Cortona, November 2, 1901 October 10, 1996), bụ di na nwunye French a họpụtara dị ka ndị ezi omume n'etiti mba
Ruo afọ 15, André jere ozi dị ka onye ụkọchukwu n'obodo France nke Le Chambon-sur-Lignon, na Plateau Vivarais-Lignor, na ndịda etiti France
A nabatara ya na parish dịpụrụ adịpụ n'ihi ọnọdụ ya na-eme udo, nke Chọọchị Protestant nke France na-anabataghị nke ọma

N'ime nkwusa ya, o kwuru okwu megide ịkpa ókè ka ndị Nazi na-enweta ike na Germany agbata obi ma gbaa ọgbakọ Protestant Huguenot ume ka ha zoo ndị Juu gbara ọsọ ndụ site na Holocaust nke Agha Ụwa nke Abụọ.
